posts.post_title: SOLD ON EBAY-- SGC 50 VG/EX 4 HOF Elmer Flick-Cleveland-Bright, Clean, Spotless!
posts.post_content:
I've got an SGC 50 VG/EX 4 I'm offering for salel---it's a beautiful, clean card w/ snow white borders.

It is one of the the cards from the Roy Mellinger collection:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=Ray+Mellinger[/url]

$249.00 delivered--Paypal Family & Friends, personal ck or MO. 

Thank You for looking!
Boy, listings fall FAST in this new T206 category!
You'll "flick" yourself later for not grabbing Elmer now!
Offering a one-time price cut to $225 for fellow Net54'ers.

One last call for those that may have missed it---I will offer it for $220 this Holiday Weekend--as "sparkling fresh" as they come!

Thanks for taking the time!
